name: Fetch Marketing Preferences for CIF Key

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000125000"

When I fetch the Customer Marketing Preferences for CIF Key <cifKey>:
| cifKey |
| 0100000930000125000 |

Then the following Marking Information data should be returned
| preferredContactDay | preferredContactDayUpdateDate | preferredContactTime | preferredContactTimeUpdateDate | mailMarketingPreferences | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | phoneMarketingPreferences | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | emailMarketingPreferences | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | preferredContactMethod | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy |
| MONDAY | 2011-11-02 |  | 2011-11-02 | OPT OUT | 2007-08-16 | OPT IN | 2008-08-05 | OPT OUT | 2007-08-16 | Mobile Number | nulll | null | null |  |  |  | 59002 | 88991 | 59002 |

children.description: Validate response: | preferredContactDay | preferredContactDayUpdateDate | preferredContactTime | preferredContactTimeUpdateDate | mailMarketingPreferences | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | phoneMarketingPreferences | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | emailMarketingPreferences | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | preferredContactMethod | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | | MONDAY | 2011-11-02 | | 2011-11-02 | OPT OUT | 2007-08-16 | OPT IN | 2008-08-05 | OPT OUT | 2007-08-16 | Mobile Number | nulll | null | null | | | | 59002 | 88991 | 59002 |
